LOT SOLD...Selling a few Graded T206 all with Piedmont backs. No paper loss or writing on any. Hope these could help someones collection. Please pm or e-mail me. First person to respond gets them.  SALE PENDING ON THE LOT

I would like paypal gift for payment. Shipping included. My e-mail/paypal address is [url]lisajoe97@yahoo.com[/url]

Would sell whole lot for $275.00 (before anyone buys singles). Thanks.

SGC 40 Bill Clancy $35
SGC 30 Rudy Hulswitt $30
SGC 30 Ed Summers $30
SGC 30 Bill Clymer $30
SGC 30 Germany Schaefer $30
SGC 30 Rebel Oakes $30
